title: Please help me!
selftext:
Hello, I am a college student working on an economics project and I need your help. I have created two short surveys that will take less than 10 minutes to complete. The surveys are about your opinions and preferences on some economic topics. Your responses are very important for my grades and will help me with my research. I would really appreciate it if you could spare some time and answer the surveys. You can access the surveys by clicking on the links below:

[Survey 1: https://forms.gle/i72Ai7wvhvkdKjTTA ]
[Survey 2: https://forms.gle/5AvGgjnAjtePs6bSA ]
Thank you very much for your time and cooperation. Your feedback is valuable to me. Have a great day! ðŸ˜Š
